com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples

Interface ITupleStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataStorage<ITupleSetDescriptor,ITupleSet>, IReadOnlyDataStorage<ITupleSetDescriptor,ITupleSet>, IReadOnlyTupleStorage
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IRWLockedTupleStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JDBCTupleStorage, MemoryTupleStorage, RWLockedTupleStorageProxy

    public interface ITupleStorage
extends IDataStorage<ITupleSetDescriptor,ITupleSet>, IReadOnlyTupleStorage
    Extends the super class to define the shared data as an ITupleSet. Methods to create the tables for a tuple set and to delete matching tuples from a table are added.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String targetTable,
          ITupleSet tuples,
          java.lang.String... excludedColumns)
            throws DSMException
        Delete from the identified table, the rows that match the given tuple values.
        Parameters:
        targetTable - name of table in which rows are to be deleted.
        tuples - identifies matching rows in target table that are to be deleted. These tuples must have the same schema (i.e. column names and types) as the target table.
        excludeColumns - list of column names NOT to include in where clause used to specify deleted rows.
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • createStorage

        void createStorage(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc,
                 java.lang.String tableName,
                 java.lang.String sql)
                   throws DSMException
        Use the given SQL to create the table in the database associated with the given application descriptor. The given tableName must match the name of the table being created in the given SQL statement. The database created must be unique to the namespace of the IApplicationDescriptor but NOT it's instance identifier.
        Parameters:
        appDesc -
        tableName - name of table being created in the SQL statement.
        sql - valid SQL create statement to create the table.
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • insert

        void insert(IApplicationDescriptor applicationDescriptor,
          java.lang.String tableName,
          java.lang.String sql)
            throws DSMException
        Execute an insert statement on the database.
        Parameters:
        applicationDescriptor -
        sql -
        Throws:
        DSMException
